com.radirius.mercury.graphics
Class VAOBatcher

java.lang.Object
  com.radirius.mercury.graphics.VAOBatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Batcher
public class VAOBatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements Batcher

A very simple OpenGL batcher.

Author:
wessles, Jeviny

flushOnOverflow

public void flushOnOverflow(int allocate)
Description copied from interface: Batcher
Will flush the data to OpenGL if the sum of the vertex count and the allocation is higher than the limit.

Specified by:
flushOnOverflow in interface Batcher
Parameters:
allocate - The amount of vertices that will be rendered in the next vertex-group.
